definition: to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: In single-dispatch polymorphism, the object that "owns" a method is singled out.
sentences.chinese: 在单分派多态性中，挑选出“拥有”方法的对象。

sentences.english: Assume you are tasked to implement a book ordering process.
sentences.chinese: 假设分派您的任务是实现图书订购流程。

sentences.english: The team leader has assigned tasks to all the groups.
sentences.chinese: 队长给每个组都分派了任务。

sentences.english: The captain billeted his soldiers on Mrs. Mary.
sentences.chinese: 上尉分派士兵住在玛丽太太家。
我恳求免除分派的那个任务。

sentences.english: The project assignment below is directed to students enrolled in the course.
sentences.chinese: 下列所列出的专题会分派给选修这堂课的学生。

sentences.english: In that latter case, it could be used to assign responsibility and track progress.
sentences.chinese: 在以后某些时候，可以用它来分派责任和跟踪过程。

sentences.english: The trigger, once pressed, dispatches a custom event.
sentences.chinese: 触发器被触发之后，就会分派一个定制的事件。

sentences.english: "Total Days" means the total number of Business Days in the relevant Distribution Period.
sentences.chinese: 指有关分派期间之总营业日数。

sentences.english: Under most circumstances, dispatch speed degrades.
sentences.chinese: 在多数情况下，分派速度会降低。

sentences.english: In general, asynchronous dispatching is required in only one of these implementations.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，在这些实现中只有一个需要异步分派。

sentences.english: It provides a disciplined approach to assigning tasks and responsibilities in a development organization.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了在开发组织中分派任务和责任的纪律化方法。

sentences.english: This transforms the main thread of the calling process into the control dispatcher.
sentences.chinese: 这将把调用进程的主线程转换为控制分派器。

sentences.english: Participate and implement specific tasks regarding HSE and 5S activities.
sentences.chinese: 根据HSE和5S的要求参与和执行所分派的任务。

sentences.english: The last thing people want is a boss who just doles out stuff.
sentences.chinese: 人们最不愿接受的老板是那种只知道分派任务的人。

sentences.english: He was waiting for the powers that is to decide what his next job would is.
sentences.chinese: 他在等待当权派给他分派下一工作。

definition: to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
to send/to assign/to appoint/servants of an official/official messenger
official post/billet/commission/CL:件[jian4]/see also 差事[chai1 shi5]
to wait for (orders, a decision, a judgment)
to order (sb) around/to send on an errand/to order away
